BBQFS.M.U2.CORP.IMP_RSK_ES50._X.0000: Implied equity risk premium Euro Stoxx 50 (FSR 2014)

Methodology: Difference on the market-implied yield and government bonds. The marktet-implied yield is calculated on the basis of residual earnings ((return on equity minus cost of equity) * book value of equity in the previous period) and prices taken from stock indices
